name: Shrooms & Taxes
description:
Construct your mushroom village - but don't get carried away! In Shrooms & Taxes you need to manage resources carefully. Build to get more income before the king takes all of it away in taxes. If you fail to pay your dues, the king will have to take your property!

Description

You start the game with a set amount of resources. Use those resources to construct buildings that provide you with certain advantages. The buildings are constructed on your town grid.

  • Quarry - produces crystals which can be sold
  • Lumber Yard - produces mushrooms that can be sold for money
  • Tavern - Increasing productivity of adjacent resource generating buildings
  • Stable - Reduces time to roll again on adjacent tiles
  • Accountant - Reduces upkeep cost on adjacent tiles
  • Church - Provides rebate after rent payment

Resources are generated based on a timer per tile. The number of resources generated is based on a random die roll.

At a certain time, the king will come by to collect taxes. When, exactly? Well, whenever he feels like it! If you don't have enough money to pay taxes, he will take some of your buildings. The type of buildings he takes are determined by a roll fo the King's Die.

Controls:

Left mouse button - all controls
